overview:
Kelly Marsh is the Director of Marketing for Klemmer & Associates, the premier leadership development company, which hosts seminars all over the world. He is responsible for web site design, search engine optimization, social media marketing, affiliate programs, blog design/strategy, and booking/supporting workshops.

Kelly received a B.A. in International Relations from San Francisco State University and currently holds his California Real Estate Broker License, Series 7 & 66 Securities Licenses, and Life/Health Insurance License.

Kelly sits on the Board of Trustees for the Tariq Khamisa Foundation (TKF) where he serves on the Marketing Committee. He is currently supporting TKFâ€™s cause based marketing campaign, Stop Kids from Killing Kids, which launched January 2010. Kelly is also responsible for video marketing to current supporters of TKF.
